overview: As NaviSite’s President, R. Brooks Borcherding provides executive leadership to the company’s senior management and is personally involved in the strategy, financing, merger and acquisition (M&A) activities, business planning and day-to-day operations of the company. Brooks leads the executive team in accelerating NaviSite’s transformation as the leading provider of cloud computing, enterprise-class hosting, and managed application services for enterprise customers. Under his leadership, NaviSite is building a world-class organization dedicated to offering clients unparalleled service and support. With his direction, we intend to further our focus on the unique requirements confronting senior level IT executives in organizations throughout the world. Brooks joins NaviSite from Cisco Systems, where he was responsible for strategy, planning, business development and sales operations for its Enterprise East division with a focus on driving revenue from Cisco’s largest customers. Previously, he held leadership positions in sales, sales management, general management, product management and information technology at Avaya, Lucent and AT&T. Brooks began his career as a senior consultant at Andersen Consulting.
